description: Following on from the success of the downhill extreme sports game Descenders, developer RageSquid and publisher No More Robots have announced the much bigger Descenders Next is coming.
title: Extreme sports game Descenders Next announced for 2025

description: The Board Game Night Humble Bundle looks to be another good one, especially if you love games styled more like board games. So here's what's in it and what compatibility to expect for Steam Deck and Desktop Linux.
title: Grab a load of hit digital board games in this new Humble Bundle

description: A few days ago the great NonSteamLaunchers project, to help you set up various third-party launchers on Steam Deck and Desktop Linux, had a new release adding support for even more launchers.
title: NonSteamLaunchers adds support for HoYo and Nexon launchers, easier EA App repairs

description: What Valve called the "jackbrick megabricker" (ouch), The Jackbox Megapicker should now stop breaking your Steam Deck after the latest update to the Native Linux version.
title: The Jackbox Megapicker fixed to stop megabreaking your Steam Deck

description: Motordoom is the latest entry in the survivor-like horde shooter genre popularised by Vampire Survivors, and this one has you do some freestyle-sports.
title: Pull off sick tricks and take down hordes of demons in Motordoom

description: NVIDIA today released a fresh update to the current ongoing 560 Beta driver series with version 560.31.02 bringing some bug fixes.
title: NVIDIA Linux Driver Beta 560.31.02 Out Now

description: Love your point and click adventures? Here's a fresh one for you! The founders of [redacted] from Relatively Painless Games looks like a great addition to your gaming library.
title: Save a town from paranormal infestation in the point and click adventure The founders of [redacted]

description: If you were hoping to see better ASUS ROG Ally X support on Linux, you're in for a treat here, as there's a big patch that's been sent in.
title: Better ASUS ROG Ally X support on Linux is coming with a big kernel patch

description: A fun idea for a nice casual puzzle game: Pixel With Your Friends has released with Linux support where you restore artworks pixel by pixel for a museum.
title: Pixel With Your Friends gets you and your pals to restore pixel-artworks for a museum

description: While other source ports are pretty popular like GZDoom, Chocolate Doom continues getting better to retain the best compatibility with the original DOS versions of Doom, Doom II, Heretic, Hexen and Strife.
title: Chocolate Doom 3.1.0 brings many new features for the classic source port

description: The Manjaro Linux team have announced the first round of testing for their new Manjaro Immutable version of the popular Linux distribution.
title: Manjaro Linux gets an Immutable version available for testing
